goal: Hanover Communications is an independent public affairs and corporate communications consultancy with special policy expertise in healthcare, financial services, trade, technology and energy, climate change and sustainability. With a client base from across Europe and beyond, Hanover uses an outcomes-focussed, flexible project management approach to help its clients achieve their business objectives through optimal integrated communication solutions. To that end, Hanover provides tailored, integrated services across the spectrum of public affairs, corporate communications and media relations for businesses, trade associations, NGOs and public sector organisations.
